item.title: Punk Rock playlist for 12/2011
item.description: Including: Bad Religion, Everyday Destruction, Good Riddance, Lucky The Donkey, Mute, Rise Against, Strung Out, The Menzingers, This Bike Is A Pipebomb, Wingnut Dishwashers Union.

item.title: Punk Rock playlist for 11/2011
item.description: Including: H2O Feat. Travis Barker, Nofx, The Bronx, The Horrible Crowes.

item.description: Including: Authority Zero, Descendents, Far From Finished, Flatliners, Mixtapes, Mock Orange, Oklahoman Street Punk, The Flatliners, The Gateway District, The Real Mckenzies.
